Thank you for choosing and using our assets!

For detailed information and guidance on assets, please refer to the LayerLab User Asset Guide. 
You can access the guide by copying and pasting the following link into your browser:
--------------------------------------
https://tinyurl.com/LayerLabAssetGuide
--------------------------------------



## Font Information & License:

The text in this asset uses the 'Baloo Bhaijaan' font provided by Google.
The text in this asset uses the 'Nanum Square Round' font provided by Naver.
You must review and comply with the licensing terms for each font.

- Baloo Bhaijaan 2
https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Baloo+Bhaijaan+2
https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Baloo+Bhaijaan+2/license


- NanumSquareRound
https://hangeul.naver.com/fonts/search?f=nanum
https://help.naver.com/service/30016/contents/18088?osType=PC&lang=ko
